    • getResourceMapFromSliders

      public java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getResourceMapFromSliders​(java.lang.String id)
      Returns a Map, even with no entries, parsed from the sliders. Each value is > 0.
      Parameters:
      id - identifier to distinguish depots/strongbox/leader cards.
      Returns:
      resource map of the DumbResourceManager associated to the given id.
